Description

Ö, The Mystic Link is a dream action-adventure video game, playable solo with a companion controlled by an AI.

In a flat world made up of archipelagos, voy, a traveller musician, discovers within the island Tae a great blue and greedy creature named Rua and who, like her, carries strange marks. In this forbidden land, a mysterious presence does not accept their intrusion. Will voy and Rua manage to tame themselves to face this hostile environment?

Immersed in a magical and mysterious world, the player discovers a fantastic creature, attaches himself to it and associates himself with it in his journey. Equipped with a superior intelligence to an ordinary animal, Rua has its own personality and will evolve according to the actions of the player to adapt to his style of play.

Ö, The Mystic Link is intended to enchant the player, to give him the thirst for discovery and to test his patience by an engaging but also mischievous companion.
